messages.message: Also is it on the roadmap to make duplicates of existing apps on the marketplace to make edits to them. For example the resume parser app is fine but I would want to add questions to it so duplicating the app and then being able to edit it to create my own app would be awesome.

Not on any official roadmap timeline yet but the concept of “installing” a public app to work on in your own workspace and then re-publishing it as a newer version of the public app is something that we’ve talked about as the next step for the App lifecycle
